body:
### Describe the bug

Build for piqueserver is failing for me and unfortunately am not involved with python. This is the result when trying to build the most recent Dockerfile with Ubuntu 24.04 LTS  with Cython 3.1.x. It does work without a problem on 3.0.x.

```
### Code to reproduce the behaviour:

https://github.com/piqueserver/piqueserver

### Expected behaviour

`
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [piqueserver.server#info] piqueserver started on Tue May 20 10:26:07 2025
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [piqueserver.server#info] advancing to map 'classicgen'
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [piqueserver.server#warn] The following config items are not used:
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [stdout#info] {'savemap': {'always_save_map': False,
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [stdout#info]              'load_saved_map': True,
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [stdout#info]              'save_at_shutdown': False},
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [stdout#info]  'ssh': {'users': {}},
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [stdout#info]  'votemap': {'autoschedule': False,
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [stdout#info]              'extension_time': '15min',
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [stdout#info]              'percentage': 80,
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [stdout#info]              'player_driven': False,
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [stdout#info]              'public_votes': True}}
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [piqueserver.server#info] Started server...
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [piqueserver.server#info] Retrieving external IP from https://services.buildandshoot.com/getip to generate server identifier.
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [piqueserver.server#info] starting ban vacuum with 0 bans
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [piqueserver.map#info] Generating map 'classicgen #295622357'...
aos_arena  | 2025-05-20T10:26:07+0000 [piqueserver.map#info] Map loaded successfully. (took 0.61s)

```

### OS

Ubuntu 24.10

### Python version

3.12

### Cython version

3.0 / 3.1

comment_data.body:
So there's definitively a code-generation error there. But: using NaN as an exception return value is already completely broken anyway because `NAN != NAN` so you can't (easily) test it.

So really we should warn you but to do this in the first place

title: [BUG] piqueserver failing to build
